verse.roman:
eṣa vaḥ kuśikā vīro
devarātas tam anvita
anye cāṣṭaka-hārīta-
jaya-kratumad-ādayaḥ

synonyms: eṣaḥ—this (Śunaḥśepha); vaḥ—like you; kuśikāḥ—O Kuśikas; vīraḥ—my son; devarātaḥ—he is known as Devarāta; tam—him; anvita—just obey; anye—others; ca—also; aṣṭaka—Aṣṭaka; hārīta—Hārīta; jaya—Jaya; kratumat—Kratumān; ādayaḥ—and others.
translation: Viśvāmitra said, "O Kuśikas [descendants of Kauśika], this Devarāta is my son and is one of you. Please obey his orders." O King Parīkṣit, Viśvāmitra had many other sons, such as Aṣṭaka, Hārīta, Jaya and Kratumān.
